titles.title: Let the redeemed of the Lord say it is so

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let the redeemed of the Lord say it is so
Let them declare His goodness in the land of the living
Let the redeemed of the Lord say it so
I am redeemed, I'm redeemed praise the Lord
You who are weary and faint, wait on the Lord
You will run and be strong, you will rise on eagle's wings
Speak unto the dry bones "Now hear the word of the Lord"
"You shall live, you shall live!" says the Lord
O barren one sing and break forth into joy
(For) you shall be fruitful and you shall multiply
Rejoice desert places, you desolate lands be glad
From you living water will flow, you will not thirst again
Take courage you fearful of heart for your God comes to save
Blind eyes will see and the lame will leap for joy
The ransomed of God shall return unto Zion with songs
Sorrow and sighing shall all flee away
